lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Ryan Tedder
[00:00.027] 作曲 : Ryan Tedder
[00:00.54]Lately I've been I've been losing sleep
[00:04.92]Dreaming about the things that we could be
[00:08.79]But baby I've been I've been praying hard
[00:13.26]Said no more counting dollars
[00:15.23]We'll be counting stars

[01:05.50]Everything that kills me makes me feel alive
[01:08.89]I see this life like a swinging vine
[01:11.07]Swing my heart across the line

[01:15.07]Seek it out and ye' shall find
